name: 亚瑟·法尔科
introduction: Arthur Falko is an actor and artist, born and raised in Cape Town, South Africa. Prior to acting, Arthur has worked as an artist on set for projects like The Dark Tower, Black Mirror, Blood Drive and Troy, before making his transition to acting in 2018. Falko has since shared the screen with house hold names, as upcoming projects include: Professionals(TV-series 2020), Prisoner 760 and Grant" mini-series produced by Leonardo DiCaprio's Appian Way.
